About Us

My name is Khushal Kale, and I am an Electrical Engineering student at Sanjivani College of Engineering, Kopargaon.

I am passionate about electrical engineering and interested in learning modern technologies, electrical systems, and practical applications of engineering concepts.

I am from Malegaon, Maharashtra, and I aim to build a successful career in the engineering field while contributing positively to society.
